      • isUpdate

        public boolean isUpdate(Updatable u,
               Update update)
        Check to see if the Update object update is a higher version than the Updatable object u
        Parameters:
        u - The Updatable object to compare
        update - The update to compare
        Returns:
        Whether the update is a higher version than the Updatable object

      • getHighestUpdate

        public Update getHighestUpdate(Updatable object)
        Get the highest version this Updatable object has to offer.
        If the Updatable object is already at its latest, then the same version will be return. If no Update representation is available for the same update, then null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        object - The Updatable object.
        Returns:
        Returns the latest update

      • getUpdates

        public Update[] getUpdates(URL url)
        Get a list of updates from a URL by reading the json from the URL.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to get the updates from.
        Returns:
        An array of Update objects.
